Package gw.plugin.baseurlbuilder

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IBaseURLBuilder
    Build a base URL to use for a Guidewire UI page, given the HttpServletRequest. The base URL is used as the prefix for all relative URLs on the page. Base URLs usually start with a concatenation of: request.getScheme() request.getServerName() request.getServerPort() where the scheme is usually http/https, server name is the name/IP address of the server and the port is the server port (can be omitted if scheme is http and port is 80, or if scheme is https and port is 443). The final part of the base URL may be the path just to the web application, as returned by {@link #getApplicationBaseURL}, or the path to the current page as returned by {@link #getPageBaseURL}.
